loadingString.name: Loading Text
loadingString.description: Set any text on the loading text label

loadingScale.name: Loading Text Scale
loadingScale.description: Set the scale of the loading text label

fishSpinner.name: Fish Spinner
fishSpinner.description: Replace the default spinner with a fish spinner

customEditorLoading.name: Editor Loading Text
customEditorLoading.description: Enable custom loading text when entering or exiting the editor. <cy>This will disable the default loading text.</cy>

exitingEditorString.name: Exiting Text
exitingEditorString.description: Set any text on the loading label when exiting the editor

enterEditorString.name: Entering Text
enterEditorString.description: Set any text on the loading label when entering the editor
